title: Payback in Death
description: Alternative cover edition of ISBN 9781250284099Lt. Eve Dallas is back and this time she's investigating the death of one of her own.When a retired police officer is found shot dead in his home, Eve and the team are called to the scene to investigate. The victim is Martin Greenleaf, former Captain of Internal Affairs. At first glance it looks like suicide but Eve thinks there could be more to this carefully laid scene than meets the eye.Captain Greenleaf put a lot of cops away during his forty-seven years in Internal Affairs. Did the weight of the job finally prove too much for him? Or could this be a case of payback in death...
author: J.D. Robb
